elements.description: The gameplayStart() function has to be called whenever the player starts playing or resumes playing after a break (menu/loading/achievement screen, game paused, etc.)
elements.name: crazygames.gameplay_start

elements.description: The gameplayStop() function has to be called on every game break (entering a menu, switching level, pausing the game, ...) don't forget to call gameplayStart() when the gameplay resumes
elements.name: crazygames.gameplay_stop

elements.description: The loadingStart() function has to be called whenever you start loading your game.
elements.name: crazygames.loading_start

elements.description: The loadingStop() function has to be called when the loading is complete and eventually the gameplay starts.
elements.name: crazygames.loading_stop

elements.description: Show a rewarded ad.
elements.name: crazygames.show_rewarded_ad

elements.description: Show a midgame ad.
elements.name: crazygames.show_midgame_ad

elements.description: Detect if the user has an adblocker.
elements.name: crazygames.is_ad_blocked

elements.description: Request a banner. The container will be resized to the specified width.
elements.name: crazygames.request_banner

elements.description: The responsive banners feature will request ads that fit into your container, without the need to specify or select a size beforehand.
elements.name: crazygames.request_responsive_banner

elements.description: Clear a banner. Will also hide it.
elements.name: crazygames.clear_banner

elements.description: Clear all banners.
elements.name: crazygames.clear_all_banners

elements.description: Create a link to your game to invite others to join a multiplayer game.
elements.name: crazygames.invite_link

elements.description: Display a button in the game footer, that opens a popup containing an invite link.
elements.name: crazygames.show_invite_button

elements.description: Hide the invite button when it is no longer necessary.
elements.name: crazygames.hide_invite_button

elements.description: Get an invite link parameters.
elements.name: crazygames.get_invite_param

elements.description: Remove all data items from the local storage.
elements.name: crazygames.clear_data

elements.description: Get a data item from the local storage.
elements.name: crazygames.get_item

elements.description: Remove a data item from the local storage.
elements.name: crazygames.remove_item

elements.description: Add a data item to the local storage.
elements.name: crazygames.set_item

elements.description: Before using any user account features, you should always ensure that the user account system is available.
elements.name: crazygames.is_user_account_available

elements.description: Retrieve the user currently logged in CrazyGames. If the user is not logged in CrazyGames, the returned user will be null. Will call the auth listener with the logged in user account.
elements.name: crazygames.get_user

elements.description: The user token is in JWT format and contains the userId of the player that is currently logged in to CrazyGames, as well as other useful information. You should send it to your server when required, and verify/decode it there to extract the userId. Will call the auth listener with the token.
elements.name: crazygames.get_user_token

elements.description: By calling this method, the log in or register popup will be displayed on CrazyGames. The user can log in their existing account, or create a new account. Will call the auth listener on log in.
elements.name: crazygames.show_auth_prompt

elements.description: You can register a user auth listener that is triggered when the player logs in to CrazyGames. A log out doesn't trigger the auth listener, since the entire page is refreshed when the player logs out.
elements.name: crazygames.set_auth_listener

parameters.doc: The function takes three arguments self, user and token
parameters.name: callback

elements.description: Remove any previously set auth listener.
elements.name: crazygames.remove_auth_listener

elements.description: Show an account linking prompt to link a CrazyGames account to the in-game account.
elements.name: crazygames.show_account_link_prompt

info.description: Functions and constants for interacting with the CrazyGames SDK APIs
info.name: extension-crazygames
